alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 26 at 3:17AM MDT until April 26 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow ongoing, diminishing by later this morning. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Castle Rock. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult in spots this morning with slick conditions with areas of icy and snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the this morning`s commute.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Persons should expect slick conditions on roadways this morning, especially over bridges and overpasses.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet
